title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
Hi,
i have this board, no liquid, i try in DFU but nothing.
i have input 5V 0A (usb-c tester), PPBUS=0,343V, 0,046 in diode mode
PPDCIN_G3H = 5V
How can i find the problem please?
thanks
best regards

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
"PPBUS=0,343V, 0,046 in diode mode"
Check if any big coil gives the same reading in diode mode.

"i try in DFU but nothing"
Can't do anything on the board, until get correct PPBUS_G3H voltage.

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
hi 2informaticos, thanks for your quick reply
i have only L8102 with the same value (0,044)
ok thanks for dfu informations

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
Check for short between PPBUS_G3H and L8102.
Isn't your board 01987?
If is the case, remove Q8102 and check again the value.

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
ok thanks, Q8102 is short PPBUS to PPVCCIO_S0_CPU
sorry my board is 01987
i try to find a new component on a donor board and i come back after

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
i remove Q1802 and i thing i have a short on PPVCCIO_S0_CPU (diode mode 0,036 on L8102)
CPU dead?

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
Looks like normal value for me.
This doesn't discard a dead CPU, because of overvoltage through Q8102...

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
i find the mac in DFU now, is it normal?
i have PPVCCIO_S0_CPU=0v, i don't know is it normal?
i take a component on 820-00045 (Q7430), i think is same, is it true?

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
DFU requires only AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages.

Did you replace Q8102?
Q7430 from 00045 board is the same MOSFET.

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
yes i replace Q8102 by donor board Q7430 00045 but no boot.
i check tomorrow for more informations.

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
You may need to change U8110 too.
Post its basic voltages; pins 13, 14, 3, 6.

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
U8110
13:5,116V
14:5,119V
3: 2,75V
6:0V
9:0V
CPU_VCCIOSENSE_P=0V
i try to find this component another board and come back for more thanks for your help

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:

is it the good component on [URL='https://fr.farnell.com/renesas/isl95870hruz-t/controleur-dc-dc-3-3-25v-1mhz/dp/2983668?ost=2983668']farnell[/URL] ?
thanks

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:
Farnell is a serious online store, why not?

Open the schematics of your donor boards and search for ISL95870H...

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H

title: 820-01987 No PPBUS_G3H
message:

thanks 2informaticos
